mapper.select: SELECT R.REPORT_NUM, R.REPORT_TITLE, M.MEM_ID, R.REPORT_DATE, R.REPORT_COUNT, R.REPORT_TYPE, TO_CHAR(R.REPORT_DATE,'hh24:mi:ss') AS REPORT_TIME, R.REPORT_STATUS FROM REPORT R, ( SELECT MEM_NUM, MEM_ID FROM MEMBER ) M WHERE R.REPORT_DEL_GB = 'N' AND R.REPORT_WRITER = M.MEM_NUM(+) ORDER BY R.REPORT_NUM

SELECT R.REPORT_NUM, R.REPORT_TITLE, M.MEM_ID, R.REPORT_DATE, R.REPORT_COUNT, R.REPORT_TYPE, TO_CHAR(R.REPORT_DATE,'hh24:mi:ss') AS REPORT_TIME, R.REPORT_STATUS FROM REPORT R, ( SELECT MEM_NUM, MEM_ID FROM MEMBER ) M WHERE R.REPORT_DEL_GB = 'N' AND R.REPORT_WRITER = M.MEM_NUM(+) AND M.MEM_ID = 1234 ORDER BY R.REPORT_NUM
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORT ( REPORT_NUM, REPORT_TITLE, REPORT_WRITER, REPORT_CONTENT, REPORT_TYPE, REPORT_PRONUM ) VALUES ( REPORT_SEQ.nextval, #{REPORT_TITLE}, (SELECT MEM_NUM FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = 1234), #{REPORT_CONTENT}, #{REPORT_TYPE}, #{REPORT_PRONUM} )
mapper.select: SELECT R.REPORT_NUM, R.REPORT_TITLE, M.MEM_ID, R.REPORT_DATE, R.REPORT_STATUS, R.REPORT_CONTENT, R.REPORT_COUNT, R.REPORT_PRONUM, R.REPORT_TYPE FROM REPORT R, ( SELECT MEM_NUM, MEM_ID FROM MEMBER ) M WHERE R.REPORT_WRITER = M.MEM_NUM(+) AND R.REPORT_NUM = #{REPORT_NUM}
mapper.update: UPDATE REPORT SET REPORT_COUNT = NVL(REPORT_COUNT, 0) + 1 WHERE REPORT_NUM = #{REPORT_NUM}
